radiographic_examinations.findings: Histopathological examination revealed stromal lymphocytic infiltration with non-specific chronic dermatitis; neither atypia nor koilocytes was observed. HPV-66 was detected by PCR.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Clinical improvement observed in 4 weeks after treatment; lesions became hyperpigmented macules without itching. No recurrence after 3 years of follow-up.
